General.Name: Kodiak Copper Corp
General.Description: Kodiak Copper Corp. focuses on the discovery of copper for a low carbon future by exploring its copper porphyry projects in Canada and the United States. The company's advanced asset is the 100% owned MPD copper-gold porphyry project in the prolific Quesnel Trough in southern British Columbia, Canada. It also holds interests in the Mohave copper-molybdenum-silver porphyry project located in Arizona, the United States. The company was formerly known as Dunnedin Ventures Inc. and changed its name to Kodiak Copper Corp. in April 2020. Kodiak Copper Corp. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
